snoopy.blindnote: (20100707末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋
snoopy.evidence: Tycowski, K. T., You, Z. H., Graham, P. J., and Steitz, J. A. (1998). Modification of U6 spliceosomal RNA is guided by other small RNAs. Mol Cell, 2, 629-638. Zhou, H., Chen, Y. Q., Du, Y. P., and Qu, L. H. (2002). The Schizosaccharomyces pombe mgU6-47 gene is required for 2'-O-methylation of U6 snRNA at A41. Nucleic Acids Res, 30, 894-902.
